description: A close friend of Francisco and Juliet`s fencing teacher. His scarred visage originated from protecting a younger rebellious Juliet from receiving punishment from members of the Carabinieri; her frustration at the time gave birth to her alter ego, The Red Whirlwind. It is hinted in episode 16 that he may have romantic feelings toward juliet. His preferred weapons are axes or polearms.
name: Curio
